input_text:
Job Title: Java/Apache Camel/Apigee Developer

Location: Kansas City, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description 

Job Description: We are seeking a talented Java Developer with specialized expertise in Apache Camel and Apigee to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java development, coupled with extensive experience in building and integrating APIs using Apache Camel and Apigee platforms. Responsibilities: 1. Design, develop, and maintain Java-based applications and services. 2. Implement and integrate APIs using Apache Camel framework to facilitate seamless communication between different systems and applications. 3. Develop and configure API proxies, policies, and security measures within the Apigee platform. 4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including architects, product managers, and other developers to ensure successful implementation and integration of APIs. 5. Troubleshoot and debug issues related to API functionality, performance, and integration. 6. Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers. 7. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices in API development, Java programming, and related technologies. 8. Document technical designs, specifications, and implementation details.

 Skills 

Apigee, Api, Java, Data integration, apache camel, Salesforce CRM, MS dynamics, proxy, cloud, software development, designing, development

 Top Skills Details 

Apigee,Api,Java,Data integration,apache camel

 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

Requirements: 1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field preferred. 2. Proven experience as a Java Developer with a strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles. 3. In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with Apache Camel framework for integration purposes. 4. Proficiency in designing, implementing, and managing APIs using the Apigee platform. 5. Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles, HTTP protocols, and JSON/XML data formats. 6. Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes is a plus. 7. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues. 8. Excellent communication and teamwork skills. 9. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities. 10. 5 to 7 years of relevant experience in Java development, Apache Camel, and Apigee API development.

 Experience Level 

Expert Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
